ygData.subject: Re: Skill advancement
ygData.msgSnippet: May I ask which items I should make or is it more of just a variety
ygData.messageBody:
May I ask which items I should make or is it more of just a variety

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Chad Butler [SMTP:butler@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 2:39 PM
> To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_SMITHS] Skill advancement
>
> From: Chad Butler <butler@...>
>
> start making banded and make a profit
>
> i made 500pp getting from skill 70 to 109
>
> At 08:38 AM 6/9/99 -0400, you wrote:
> >From: "McConnell, Jeff" <Jeff.McConnell@...>
> >
> >Hello
> >
> >Well I guess asking how to make Studs and Bonding is not an intelligent
> >question (and here I thought this list was to share information about
> >smithing) so I will ask another. I am currently at 69 smithing, I have a
> 50
> >to 75% success rate on bracers and gorgets and slightly lower on boots
> and
> >roughly 25% on helms and masks. I am still working off and on with
> skewers
> >but it has been a while since I have gotten any gain from them. So
> question
> >is: From a strictly skill improvement point of view what is the best way
> to
> >raising smithing at 69 skill.
> >
> >Thanks again
> >Silver
> >
> >
